documents.document: How good would it be if I turned up to sign the papers for my new car and the salesman was like 'oh there's the keys, it's ready'
Frank Lampard and Steven Gerrard in the same year, there goes my childhood
See when your mind is racing but your trying to sleep, that's no a good combination
Straight to bed I think
I'd do anything to see Walter smith back in the dugout, you don't see that passion these days https://t.co/InDykgyvq1
Dunno whether to laugh or cry, this is absolutely dreadful, actually pathetic performance yet again away from home in a big game
Shambolic defending
No idea what Halliday is thinking there, dreadful
Handed hearts two goals on a plate
Can't help falling in love with Hyndman
So proud of @lucy_morrice getting two unconditionals to her first choice uni! Well done!! ❤️😬
This is pathetic yet again
@norrieblack1 honestly Norrie the man can't defend, I'd love to see the stat of how many goals we've conceded coz of him
Can't fall in love with Emerson Hyndman because he'll be away in the summer 😭😭😭
Thanks for the laughs Efe Ambrose
@lucy_morrice oh well would you look at that
Actual makes my blood boil
@lucy_morrice @DisneyReactss that is VERY accurate
@lucy_morrice defo no me shaking those hips
@lucy_morrice my sentiments exactly
Lucy and me actually speak to each other like a married couple of 40 years eh, it's actually quite worrying
Me and Lucy actual eat the most shite hahaha it needs to stop
@barryredpath aw sorry bud I didn't see you!! I would have stopped otherwise!
@barryredpath aye I was there filling up the shitey corsa, thankfully that will be getting rid of! Where were you off to?
@barryredpath exact same, I loved my old car! Wee change of colour this time though, it's metallic blue
It shall be named Fred, in honour of Fred the red fiesta who is now sadly in the scrapyard in the sky
So glad to have finally gotten my car sorted! I'll be a very happy man in the next two weeks when my new one comes!
@RiccardoBURROWS happy birthday my friend, I hope you have a good day and heather spoils you! Miss you! ❤️️❤️️ https://t.co/HSKrCEIz1B
@lucy_morrice always got me ❤️❤️❤️
@_DannySimpson_ it was such a shame! Poured his wee heart out and she bumped him!
Really don't want to sleep alone tonight
@WindassJnr is a laugh on twitter, what a lad😂😂
Only team that's letting me down as well man
Wigan no won at home in 6 games, take Brentford and their 2-0 up🙄🙄🙄
@norrieblack1 I rarely go over a fiver myself because I'm useless at it
@norrieblack1 neither do i, I never touched it! Ohhhh that's a sore one!
@norrieblack1 never take the early game Norrie my friend
Now time for the coupon... Dunfermline, home of my girlfriend let me down last week. Obvious to take them again this week🙄🙄🙄
Andy Halliday doesn't half take some kickings through a game eh
Been impressed with that Hyndmann since he came on
We don't look like a team with only 7 minutes left, there's no urgency
Same old story with Rangers, pass pass and pass with no quality or end product in the final third.
That's his man! He loses him! You can't blame Hodson! Fucking losing count with how many goals Kiernan is costing us
WHAT IS KIERNAN DOING?!
Wallace is miles onside, what a poor decision
MOH showing why he should be starting every week
Craig Thomson is fucking rotten, that's a joke
That's a stonewall penalty!!
Barrie McKay is back to the best of last season, what a fine wee footballer
@lucy_morrice @JPB1895_ Hahahaha aye your sure soon show them how it's done!
@norrieblack1 aye mate, liability isn't an issue coz it's his fault, it's just waiting on the figure so I can start getting a new one sorted
@norrieblack1 its been so long! Aye I have a hire car but now they're on the phone wanting me to start chasing up coz they want the car back
@norrieblack1 so it's now getting a little boring
@norrieblack1 still nothing mate, disputing the valuation, waiting on the finance company to get back to it! the accident was 30th November!
This whole car situation is really beginning to get frustrating now, getting the same phone calls every week to tell me the same thing
@RossMcIntyre9 happy birthday Rossco, finally got there eh! Have a good day bud!
Whoever made the toastie bag is a genius
I didn't even know Matt Crooks had went out on loan 😂😂
@lucy_morrice yeah I know your right, I was only joking
@lucy_morrice do I though? Do I really though?
Me and Lucy keep saying the same things at the exact same time to each other, like it's frightening
Actual wish I was following Rangers in Germany, it looks class!
@lucy_morrice @unclehxlmes nah don't please never do that
Ridiculous money https://t.co/Kohyvwbnpj
Credit to Lucy for putting up with me for 6 months https://t.co/JZL4Xf37dn
@barryredpath you seen the pictures? They can't even clear it because of the wind! Aye he's been charged for it, neither wonder!
@norrieblack1 😂😂😂😂 only went and flipped his lorry! Fanny!
I canny believe a lorry tried to go over the bridge last night in that wind
Actually wish I could go back and relive Biffy Clyro in Glasgow, what a night
Shite no having Lucy here
The amount of times Lucy calls me an arsehole is unreal #arsehole

I'd love to go a walk up Arthur Seat with Lucy but let's face it, my legs and lungs can't handle the climb anymore
What a film inception is

Played all of the big teams with Everton in first 8 games of the season and sitting 7th... Legacy being built
@lucy_morrice @Kirsty_Baxter_4 you really really don't kirsty
@lucy_morrice no please don't it will embarrass me
@lucy_morrice I'm not a Gimp I'm actually just really cool
Lucy and I are in bed, I'm watching MOTD and playing football manager whilst she reads her book.. When's the wedding? 😶😶😶
@lucy_morrice well that's rude and uncalled for
@lucy_morrice your more than welcome, have a pleasant evening
@lucy_morrice sorry I'm a gimp
@norrieblack1 some touch for the second though, got yourselves a player
@norrieblack1 he's not the obi wan tho
Went to check the Hibs team news but must have offended them in the past. Apologies to all Im a different person now https://t.co/fZoGC95Rgc
If there's one player I've never rated, it's got to be John Obi Mikel
Back from 6 days off straight into a 4am start for one day only means a zero chance of any sleep tonight
@lucy_morrice aye but it takes you about 50 million years to dry your hair so why would I go first??
Should Lucy get up and get in the shower so we can go for a cheeky Nando's??
@lucy_morrice don't tell me to shut up on twitter in front of my friends
@lucy_morrice I'll put American dad back on when you stop sinking your teeth into my arm like a fucking shark
Lucy turned match of the day off, so I took the controls and put it back on, so she bit me😂🤔
@rodddddytweedie tell me about it
So lucky to have an amazing girl like Lucy with me
Happy new year to all my friends and family when it comes!! Hope you all have a ball, pardon the pub
Getting spangled tonight!
Rob Kiernan is still a massive liability. We were in control until they scored. Must improve
Quality of Celtic showed, credit to them. We performed better, still a massive gap but we know where to improve. Drop Tav now
Personally I think Tavernier has been murder today, murder for months
